summary: Provides a command‑line interface for the Docling library, exposing commands to convert input documents of various formats (PDF, images, etc.) into structured outputs, configure OCR and processing options, and export results.
business_intent: Allows end‑users and automation scripts to perform document parsing and conversion without writing code, supporting integration into data ingestion pipelines and simplifying the extraction of text, tables, and metadata from scanned or digital files.
